actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act of 1972 to modify the authorization of appropriations for the program of special project grants and contracts, and for other purposes.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Authorizes such appropriations as necessary for the program of special project grants and contracts under the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act of 1972.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act of 1972 to modify the authorization of appropriations for the program of special project grants and contracts, and for other purposes.
